# didigenr

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The package provides the infrastructure to automatically generate and evaluate
discrimination diagrams.

It uses Delaunay triangulation and intersection area  calculation as proposed by
@Han_2020 to generate and evaluate the discrimination diagrams.

## Installation

You can install the development version of didigenr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("abuseki/didigenr")
```
